crud.name: active
crud.query: FROM portofino_public_groups groups WHERE groups.groupId NOT IN (SELECT groups2.groupId FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug INNER JOIN ug.group groups2 WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate is null)

crud.name: current
crud.query: FROM portofino_public_groups groups WHERE groups.groupId in (SELECT groups2.groupId FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug INNER JOIN ug.group groups2 WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate is null)

crud.name: past
crud.query: FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate IS NOT null

portletPage.title: report title
portletPage.name: report
portletPage.query: select project_id, count(*) from issues group by project_id
